title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Get to Know Us Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park enjoys the unique distinction in the National Park Service of being the only unit to interpret the U.S.-Mexican War. Looking to learn more about this important site? This page is a great place to start.  Â          History & Culture   Discover the people, places, and stories that make Palo Alto Battlefield a special place.            Nature at Palo Alto   Palo Alto is more than a battlefield. The park also protects a variety of plant and animal life.        Education at Palo Alto   Make Palo Alto your classroom where human and natural history come alive for your students.              Palo Alto's Photo Gallery   Browse our public domain photos. Photo credit should be given to the NPS and/or photographer.        Palo Alto Has Something for the Kids Too   Palo Alto Battlefield is not just for history buffs. The park is constantly adding programming geared for kids.
